attributes.action: More Financial help for cancer sufferers
attributes.additional_details: Many cancer sufferers like myself have been left struggling financially, without any help. Yet drug users are given supplements to feed their habit, which i must add is through choice.. People who claim they are depressed get DLA, yet someone with a life threatening disease can not.THIS NEEDS TO CHANGE. I ask everyone to please sign this petition if you know someone who has been affected by cancer
